glsa.title: SquidClamav: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in SquidClamav may result in Denial of Service.

background.p: SquidClamav is a HTTP anti-virus for Squid based on ClamAV and ICAP.

description.p: SquidClamav does not properly escape URLs before passing them to the system command call.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted URL to SquidClamav, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SquidClamav users should upgrade to the latest version:
